reports.headline: ACTION-PACKED DAY: 10 MATCHES, 36 KOS!
reports.report:
What a day at the Smash Arena! We witnessed 10 intense matches with a combined 36 knockouts.

will was the workhorse of the day, grinding through 10 matches with 5 victories.

The hottest player was jmoon who maintained an impressive 80.0% win rate.

We even saw perfection today - jmoon delivered a flawless 3-0 with INCINEROAR!

The arena awaits more battles tomorrow. Who will rise to the top?
